actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for capital gains treatment for certain termination payments received by former insurance salesmen.
short_title: Fair Tax Treatment for Insurance Agents' Termination Payments Act of 2002

summary.text: Fair Tax Treatment for Insurance Agents' Termination Payments Act of 2002- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to consider a qualified termination payment received from an insurance company by a former insurance salesman for such company as a sale or exchange of a capital asset held for more than 12 months.

titles.title: Fair Tax Treatment for Insurance Agents' Termination Payments Act of 2002
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for capital gains treatment for certain termination payments received by former insurance salesmen.
